data.prayer: Over 22.69 percent of the people of Guadalajara are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Guadalajara, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Guadalajara, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.section_summary: On average, 19 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Guadalajara, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Guadalajara, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 3,942 believers living in Guadalajara, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. 0.1% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Guadalajara, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Guadalajara to agree with you and with one another.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Guadalajara, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
